answers.answer: I have never heard darkening skin as a symptom of thyroid disease. You should see a Dr. Just a guess, but it could be due to an Adrenal issue.
I've also read that type II diabetes can present with darkening patches of skin.What type and dosage of thyroid medication are you on?

Hello,the darkening of the skin could also be due to something called polycystic ovarian syndrome / insulin resistance.You need to see your Dr about this.  if it is due to insulin resistance a drug called glucophage / metformin can be useful.
